__e: And who kept those geeks going all night long?
I'm so sick... of these freaks... giving us hell.
There must be 200 of them fucking freaks... and any minute now they'll be coming to kick our ass.
We are the Inhuman Resistance, and we will no longer allow our kind to be treated as freaks and criminals.
So I will do what I have to, in this world of freaks and sub-human creatures.
This film is about a boy who thinks his parents favor his brothers, so he turns them into freaks and kills them.
